name: cotab
description: Cursor Smart Rewrites-style inline edit suggestions. OpenAI compatible API / LM Studio / Ollama support.

commands.title: Cotab: [Server] Install or update - Easily install/update llama.cpp on the system via the web.
Cotab: [Server] Uninstall - Uninstall llama.cpp installed on the system
Cotab: [Server] Start - Start the llama-server on the system
Cotab: [Server] Stop - Stop the llama-server on the system
Cotab: [Menu] If you hover without clicking, the menu will appear!

cotab.basic.disableForExtensions.description: Disable the extension for extensions (comma separated list of file extensions. e.g. 'txt,json')

cotab.basic.autoStart.description: Automatically start server when extension activates

cotab.basic.autoStopOnIdleTime.description: Idle timeout in seconds before auto-stopping server

cotab.basic.commentLanguage.description: Comment language. If empty, uses OS language (e.g. 'English', '日本語', '简体中文', 'Français')

cotab.basic.selectedPromptMode.description: Used prompt settings mode. If empty, uses default coding prompt

cotab.llm.apiBaseURL.description: OpenAI compatible Base URL (e.g. `http://localhost:8080/v1`) recommended llama-server

cotab.llm.localServerArg.description: Arguments for launching the local server (llama.cpp)

cotab.llm.temperature.description: Creativity (0-1, lower values recommended. if -1, server's default setting is used)

cotab.llm.top_p.description: Top-p sampling (if -1, server's default setting is used)

cotab.llm.top_k.description: Top-k sampling (if -1, server's default setting is used)

cotab.llm.maxTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens for LLM output

cotab.llm.maxOutputLines.description: Maximum number of output lines from LLM

cotab.prompt.additionalSystemPrompt.markdownDescription: Additional prompt to add to the default system prompt

cotab.prompt.additionalUserPrompt.markdownDescription: Additional prompt to add to the default user prompt

cotab.prompt.additionalAssistantThinkPro.markdownDescription: Additional prompt to add to the default assistant thinking prompt

cotab.prompt.additionalAssistantOutputPr.markdownDescription: Additional prompt to add to the default assistant output prompt

cotab.promptDetail.startEditingHereSymbo.description: Symbol string indicating the start of editing

cotab.promptDetail.stopEditingHereSymbol.description: Symbol string indicating the end of editing

cotab.promptDetail.completeHereSymbol.description: Symbol string inserted during code completion

cotab.promptDetail.aroundBeforeLines.description:
Number of lines to retrieve before cursor position (LLM inference target range)
 Recommended: 0 
(Setting to 0 makes LLM output start from cursor line, stabilizing LLM output)

cotab.promptDetail.aroundAfterLines.description: Number of lines to retrieve after cursor position (edit target range)

cotab.promptDetail.aroundMergeAfterLines.description:
End line of surrounding code used during merge (edit target range)
Recommended: cotab.promptDetail.aroundAfterLines + LLM output lines (~10) + about 5 lines

cotab.promptDetail.aroundCacheBeforeLine.description:
Start line of surrounding code for cache utilization.
If cursor position doesn't exceed this line, source code in User Prompt won't be updated, enabling effective Prompt Cache usage.

cotab.promptDetail.aroundCacheAfterLines.description:
End line of surrounding code for cache utilization.
If cursor position doesn't exceed this line, source code in User Prompt won't be updated, enabling effective Prompt Cache usage.

cotab.promptDetail.maxSymbolCount.description: Maximum number of symbols to include in symbol code blocks

cotab.detail.logLevel.description: Log output level (ERROR: errors only, WARNING: warnings and above, INFO: info and above, DEBUG: everything)

cotab.ui.showProgressSpinner.description: Show spinner icon while completing code completion

cotab.quickSetup.hideOnSetup.description: Do not show Quick Setup on next startup
